Metadata.title: visicheck.ai – AI Visibility Tracking
Metadata.description: Track the visibility of your domains and brands in ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini and Perplexity.

Landing.title: Track your brand visibility in AI chats
Landing.description: Monitor how ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini and Perplexity mention your domains and brands. Define prompts, choose intervals – daily, weekly or monthly.
Landing.featureDomainsDesc: Add your domains and brands and link them to prompt sets.
Landing.featurePromptsDesc: Create prompts that measure your visibility across the four AI models.
Landing.featureIntervalsDesc: Daily, weekly, monthly or on-demand – you decide.
Landing.featurePasswordlessDesc: Secure sign-in via magic link – no password needed.
